name: NodeJS [1.0]
author: contact@inetol.net
description: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, back-end JavaScript runtime environment that runs on the V8 engine and executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.
startup: if [ -f /home/container/package.json ]; then /usr/local/bin/npm install --production; fi; if [[ {{DIR}} == *"/"* ]]; then cd {{DIR}}; fi; /usr/local/bin/node {{FILE}} {{FLAGS}}

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt update && apt upgrade -y && apt install -y build-essential git && /usr/local/bin/npm install npm --global && apt autoremove -y && apt autoclean && apt clean
echo -e ""
echo -e "Install complete! 1.0"
echo -e ""
exit 0
